A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very weak storytelling and Disney's need to incorporate cute animals to sell to children are what lost me on this movie. Yes\, there were some very cool scenes and moments that I loved\, but they were buried by the lack of creativity with the story timeline... which if you break it down is trying to intertwine random slow developing plot lines with a nonsensical 2 hour long car chase. I would have been ok with that logic if the rest of the timeline made any sense\, but there was zero effort to logically connect the events.
